<style type="text/css">.n2-ss-spinner-simple-white-container {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    margin: -20px;
    background: #fff;
    width: 20px;
    height: 20px;
    padding: 10px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    z-index: 1000;
}

.n2-ss-spinner-simple-white {
  outline: 1px solid RGBA(0,0,0,0);
  width:100%;
  height: 100%;
}

.n2-ss-spinner-simple-white:before {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    width: 20px;
    height: 20px;
    margin-top: -11px;
    margin-left: -11px;
}

.n2-ss-spinner-simple-white:not(:required):before {
    content: '';
    border-radius: 50%;
    border-top: 2px solid #333;
    border-right: 2px solid transparent;
    animation: n2SimpleWhite .6s linear infinite;
}
@keyframes n2SimpleWhite {
    to {transform: rotate(360deg);}

<h1 style="text-align: center;">What We Offer</h1>
<div class="fourcol column">
<p style="text-align: center;"><i class="la la-play-circle" style="font-size:40px;color:#000000"></i></p>
<h3 style="text-align: center;">Free African Song Tutorials</h3>
<p style="text-align: center;">We have a long list of free African song tutorials from gospel to afropop and anything African. We take our time to walk you through the song so that by the time you’re done learning you can rock off in style</p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><a href="/free-song-tutorials" target="_self" class="element-button medium primary">View Free Song Tutorials</a>
</div>
<div class="fourcol column">
<p style="text-align: center;"><i class="la la-industry" style="font-size:40px;color:#000000"></i></p>
<h3 style="text-align: center;">Free Concept Tutorials</h3>
<p style="text-align: center;">Not only do we teach you how to play specific songs, but we’ve gone further to outlay some basic, intermediate and advance fundamentals necessary to help you achieve your dream of becoming a very good pianist. We have free concept tutorials like How to play sofas and chords in all keys, how to stop using transpose and many more</p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><a href="/free-concept-tutorials" target="_self" class="element-button medium primary">View Free Concept Tutorials</a>
</div>
<div class="fourcol column last">

<h3 style="text-align: center;">Paid Concept Tutorials</h3>
<p style="text-align: center;">Our paid courses contains step by step breakdowns of major concepts requisite for achieving the aim of becoming a professional piano player. We teach concepts like how to find the progression of any song, runs, licks and many intermediate and advance stuff all at a very cheap and affordable price. Visit our store</p>
<p style="text-align: center;"><a href="/shop" target="_self" class="element-button medium primary">Visit Store</a>

Terms And Conditions

Terms For Booking Us For A Seminar

Seminar Terms

Within Greater Accra:

  • Standard Booking fee of GHC 550. One time payment for seminar booking
  • We Charge GHC 200 per hour in the main event
  • Note well that this hour is not the hours the chosen keyboardist will speak or perform
    his duties. It is solely the number hours he will be present at the even he has been invited to

Outside Greater Accra:

  • Transportation in and out of the region will be borne by you
  • Hotel (If necessary), food and other expenses will be fully borne by you
  • Standard Booking fee of GHC 550. one time payment
  • We Charge GHC 200 per hour in the main event
  • Note well that this hour is not the hours the chosen keyboardist will speak or perform
    his duties. It is solely the number hours he will be present at the even he has been invited to

 

I Agree Proceed To Book

Terms For One On One Lessons

  • One On One Lessons Are charged on a per hour basis but billed monthly
  • Booking fee of GHC 50. One time payment
  • One hour will cost you GH 50
  • Minimum of 2 meetings per week
  • Minimum of 6 teaching and practice hours per week
  • It will cost you 50 x 6 x 4 = GHC 1200 minimum for one on one session per month
  • Payment Plan 1:Pay 100% at once
  • Payment Plan 2:50% of the total agreed price will be paid before lessons start :30% a week after the start of lessons and the rest of the 20% at the end of the second week
  • Renewal of the contract will attract a percentage discount of 15% for month two upwards
  • You can also change your tutor at a cost

NB: Only Accra And Kumasi Are Applicable at the moment

I Agree With The Terms Proceed to book

 

Terms For Gig Or Program

One Day Program

Within Greater Accra:

  • Booking Fee GHC 50
  • We charge a flat rate of GHC 100 per hour
  • Hour means how many hours the program lasts not how many hours they sang or the keyboardist played

Outside Greater Accra:

  • Booking Fee GHC 50
  • We charge a general transportation fee of GHC 200
  • We charge a flat rate of GHC 100 per hour in the main event
  • Hour means how many hours the program lasts not how many hours they sang or the keyboardist played

 

Two – Three Day Programe

Within Greater Accra:

  • Booking Fee GHC 100
  • We charge a flat rate of GHC 1000 for the whole 2 or 3 day program whether evening and morning or morning only or evening only

Outside Greater Accra:

  • Booking Fee GHC 100
  • Tranportation Fee GHC 200
  • Accommodation (Hotel / Air B an B) will be fully Borne by host
  • Food Allowance GH 100
  • Main event we will charge GHC 1000 for the two – three day event

As Yet You can only book us for A day event or two to three day event, we do not do one week events and above

I Agree Proceed To Book

Term For Custom Request (Other)

  • Flat booking fee of GHC 50. One time payment
  • Minimum GHC 100 and above per hour depending on the intensity of the job
I Agree Proceed To Book

FAQ

How Many Paid Videos Do You Have? And Can I See A List?

We have 11 Courses in total as of June 2018

They are as follows:

1. Ghana worship tutorials Volume 1, 2 & 3 – *GHC 50*

2. How to the progression of any song Volume 1 & 2 – *GHC 50*

3. Gh highlife Tutorials Volume 1 & 2 – *GHC 50*

4.Runs, licks, scales, sevenths, polychords & passing chords- *GHC 50*

5. Gh Praise Masterclass 2019 Section 1 – 7 – *GHC 100*

How To Buy Paid Videos On Piano Afrik With Paypal Or Master Card

Watch the video below or scroll down to follow steps

All you need to have is a paypal account or visa/master card to be able to shop on our online store. Follow these steps if you qualify:

  1. Visit our Shop
  2. Browse through the items and add what you wish to buy to “basket” by clicking on the add the “add to basket” option
  3. Add more items if you want and when you are done selecting [“adding to basket”] please click on the “View Basket” to take you to the order summary page
  4. You will see your order in summary at this stage and confirm whether that is the correct order and click on Proceed To Checkout
  5. When you Click on Proceed To Checkout it should take you to the checkout page and choose the payment method you want. For now its only Paypal but you can pay with your visa or master card as well.
  6. When Payment is done, you will receive an email with the details of your full order and you can also access all the videos you’ve bought Here

How To Buy Paid Videos With Pianoafrik Coupons

We have introduced a new thing called pianoafrik coupons. These coupons can be used purchase our paid videos without paypal or mastercard. You can get our coupons by buying with mobile money. Read more about our coupons here.. Now Lets proceed to how to use coupons to buy videos on our website

Watch the video below or scroll down to follow steps

  1. Visit our Shop
  2. Browse through the items and add what you wish to buy to “basket” by clicking on the add the “add to basket” option
  3. Add more items if you want and when you are done selecting [“adding to basket”] please click on the “View Basket” to take you to the order summary page
  4. On your left side you will see a field called “Add Coupon ” and button called “apply”. Please input the coupon number and click “Apply”. Thats all
  5. You will receive an email with the details of your full order and you can also access all the videos you’ve bought Here

How To Buy Pianoafrik Coupons Using Mobile Money

Read All About How To Order Paid VideosHere

<h1 style="text-align: center;">What We Offer</h1>

<h3 style="text-align: center;">Free African Song Tutorials</h3>
<p style="text-align: center;">We have a long list of free African song tutorials from gospel to afropop and anything African. We take our time to walk you through the song so that by the time you’re done learning you can rock off in style</p>

<p style="text-align: center;">Not only do we teach you how to play specific songs, but we’ve gone further to outlay some basic, intermediate and advance fundamentals necessary to help you achieve your dream of becoming a very good pianist. <p style="text-align: center;">Our paid courses contains step by step breakdowns of major concepts requisite for achieving the aim of becoming a professional piano player.
